no.ntnu.imt3281.project1

Class BaseComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.ntnu.imt3281.project1.BaseComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, Label, TextArea, TextField

    public class BaseComponent
extends Object
implements Serializable
    BaseComponent class contains all the common properties of the different components.
    Author:
    thomasgg, sadario
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BaseComponent()
      The no-argument BaseComponent constructor creates a new component with an empty text field and default values for the number of rows and columns the component spans.
      BaseComponent(BaseComponent component)
      The 1-argument BaseComponent constructor takes an existing component as parameter and copies its attributes to a new component.
